short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A crypto wallet for Ethereum, Bitcoin, and NFTs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The tastycrypto wallet is a free, self-custody wallet supporting the Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Polygon blockchain networks, providing complete control and management of your digital assets and NFTS, all in an easy-to-use browser extension.

Features:

Multi-network support: Manage and swap over 1,000+ tokens across the Bitcoin, Ethereum, Polygon, and Solana networks.

Simple Transfers: Move your crypto assets between exchanges or wallets with ease.

Seamless Swaps: Swap between supported cryptocurrencies directly within the app.

Web3 and DeFi Access with WalletConnect: Easily connect to decentralized applications to access protocols for staking, borrowing, liquidity pools, and more.

Buy Crypto: Purchase cryptocurrency directly through the app using PayPal or Transak.

tastytrade Integration: Connect to tastytrade and effortlessly move your assets between a tastytrade brokerage account and the tastycrypto wallet.

NFTs: Store and send NFTs across Ethereum and Polygon.

Stay in Control. As a non-custodial wallet, you have full control over your assetsâ€”just remember to securely store your seed phrase!
